author.name: Ivaylo Ivanov Alichkov
author.p1:
Hello! My name is Ivo and I am the author of the application Mama's Bakery. I'm in it
                             used photos of the sweets she makes, as well as their recipes. Created by me
                             application is intended to serve as a portfolio for me, as although the products presented in it
                             to be real, when ordering from the app there will be no real delivery even though it
                             tracks the various order/delivery cycles of the product.
author.p2:
A little information about me:
                                 I have been studying software engineering for over a year, and the application you see is
                                 my first serious project. Its full description can be found by following
                                 the link to the Github repository:
author.p3:
In short, in the creation of
                                 project I have used React for the front-end part and Spring for the back-end, the database is
                                 MySQL. If you wish to contact me, you can find me at
                                 footer-a e-mail or LinkedIn, as well as leave me a message in the comments section at
                                 the application itself.
